title: Bioacoustics Cookbook
description: examples of common bioacoustic workflows in Python
dataExploration: example of calculating sunrise and sunset times at coordinate locations
organization: example of filtering audio files to include only specific date ranges, converting between UTM and lat/long coordinates
annotation: examples of reviewing and annotating audio clips based on classifier scores and metadata in Jupyter Notebook
classifierFeatures: examples of setting up machine learning training, feature extraction, and shallow classifier training
